fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: Name - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtTaxpayerSSN
fields.title: ssn: Identifying number - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtTotQualEngEffHome
fields.title: Line 1a. Enter the total number of qualified energy efficient homes including qualified energy efficient manufactured homes meeting the 50% standard that were sold or leased to another person for use as a residence during the tax year

fields.name: txtMulTotQualEngEffHome
fields.title: Line 1b. Multiply line 1a by $2, 000 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTotQualEngEffManuHome
fields.title: Line 2a. Enter the total number of qualified energy efficient manufactured homes meeting the 30% standard that were sold or leased to another person for use as a residence during the tax year

fields.name: txtMulTotQualEffManuHome
fields.title: Line 2b. Multiply line 2a by $1, 000 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtCdtFrmPartnerCorporation
fields.title: Line 3. Energy efficient home credit from partnerships and S corporations

fields.name: txtCurrYrF8908Cdt
fields.title: Line 4. Add lines 1b, 2b, and 3. Partnerships and S corporations, report this amount on Schedule K. All -  This field is automatically calculated for you
